zone.line: media of the process.
Poetry is the record of the happiest &
best moments of the happiest & best
minds. We are aware of evanescent
visitations of thought & feeling sometimes
associated with place or person, sometimes
regarding our own mind alone, & always
arising unforeseen & departing unbidden,
but elevating & delightful beyond all
expression: so that even in the desire
& the regret they leave there cannot
but be pleasure, participating as
it does in the nature of it's object.
It is as it were the interpenetration
of a diviner nature through our
own, but it's footsteps are like those
a
of the wind over a sea, which the
coming calm erases, & whose
traces remain only upon the
wrinkled sand which paves it.
